features: 【Comprehensive Trauma Kit】Our 315pcs first aid kit is designed to provide comprehensive first aid solutions for managing traumatic injuries. It includes a wide range of essential first aid supplies to treat wounds, control bleeding, and stabilize patients in emergency situations, maximum coverage for essential medical needs in daily life and outdoor adventures. Perfect for camping hiking backpacking, wild adventure, and other outdoor activities.

【Essential Survival Gear and Equipment】Our first aid kit also equips several practical essential survival tools, such as emergency blankets, scissors, whistles, and multi-function pocket card, hand-pressing flash light. These tools play a vital role in ensuring your safety and well-being in challenging environments or unexpected circumstances. They enable you to build shelters, keep warm and light, and even signal for help in emergencies. Help to improve the chances of survival while emergency.

【Compact Mini First Aid Kit】This trauma kit is compactly organized in a durable and lightweight waterproof box, making it easy to carry. The carrying box is designed with multiple compartments for quick and easy access to the necessary medical supplies during emergencies. It’s a perfect home and travel first aid kit. Thoughtful gifts for women mum who are always busy in the kitchen.

【Superior Emergency Kit, Versatile Applications】All the medical supplies, from sterile dressings and bandages to tourniquets, are of high quality, and are carefully selected to ensure effectiveness and reliability. Whether it's for outdoor adventures, first aid training, or emergency preparedness at home or in the workplace, this emergency trauma kit is suitable for various situations. It’s designed to address a wide range of traumatic injuries, including cuts, burns, fractures, and more.

【After-sale Guarantee】This is an professional trauma kit. Its comprehensive contents and reliable quality make it an essential tool for anyone who needs to be prepared for managing traumatic injuries effectively and promptly. If the 315pcs emergency first aid kit doesn’t live up your expectations, or you have any issues, contact us for fast and we will solve it to make sure that you are happy with your purchase.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A Must-having Professioanl First Aid Kit We never know exactly when and where an emergency, earthquakes, natural disasters, accidents or injuries will happen. An professional first aid kit is essential for everyone, whether you're an outdoor enthusiast, adventurer, or preparing for emergency situations. This first aid kit contains 315pcs practical survival gear and emerngency medical supplies. It's widely trusted and used by healthcare professionals, and emergency responders, and suitable for home, workplace,office,school, road trips, travel, sports, and provide reliable protection for you while emergency.

Why Choose This First Aid Kit ? ● Portable Design. All the emergency medical supplies are neatly arranged in a red waterproof box. It's small, lightweight, easy to carry, and can be placed in cars, backpack, drawer, etc. ●High Quality. All the emergency medical supplies in our first aid kit are of high quality, and manufactured with strict quality standards to meet the needs of emergency responders and medical professionals. ●Comprehensive and Widely application. Our survival first aid kit contains full range of first aid supplies for treating common cuts, scrapes, minor aches and injuries. you can use in your daily life for home, office, school, travel, sports, camping, hiking, boating, and any other outdoor adventure.

315pcs First Aid Supplies, Maximum Coverage for Essential Medical Needs 1.Ahesive Bandage ×50 8.Bandage Triangulaire ×1 15.Scissor ×1 2.Knuckle Bandage ×15 9.Non-adherent Wound Pad ×5 16.Tweezer ×1 3.Alcohol Pad ×50 10.Non-woven Medical tape ×1 17.CPR Mask ×1 4.Iodine Pads ×20 11.Tourniquet ×1 18.Ice Pack ×1 5.Sting Relief Pads ×40 12.PBT Bandage ×1 19.Whistle ×1 6.Soap Wipe ×10 13.Cotton Swabs ×60 7.Adhesive Eye Pad ×4 14.PVC Gloves ×30

Practical Survival Tools, Help to Improve the Chances of Survival in Emergencies Multifunctional Pocket Card Multi-tool contains 12 tools(screwdriver, simple opener, ruler, rope cutter , canned screwdriver, keyhole, serrated,), but only has the size of a credit card. Easy to carry with you wherever you go. It's a great helper that always at hand. Hand-Pressing Flash Light Flashlight needs no batteries, activate the bright 3LED light by simply cranking the handle a few times. A perfect light source when in a place with no power or during power outages. It's very convenient and suitable for camping, night fishing, emergency lighting, or other night activities. Emergency Blanket This emergency blanket is specially designed for outdoor activities, and can retain up to 90% of body heat. It's waterproof, windproof, and moisture-proof, can be used as ground cover, sleeping bag liner, and keep you warm in outdoors. Lightweight and portable, perfect for camping, hiking, wild adventure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: What a perfect size and durability for the car or an emergency. Love all the contents and packaged well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Many useful items
reviews.reviewText: Kit as a whole as many useful items. Four stars is because of the flashlight. As you can see in the photo, the piece broke off on my first time trying it. This is what would hold the handle closed the you pump to charge it. You can still turn it on and off, but how long before that piece breaks and makes it useless?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I received this product with skepticism and animosity at first. But it has truly opened my eyes to the market of first aid kits. Necessary for babies, made my testosterone boost tenfold and it also comes with a cool crank flashlight. Highly recommend its sturdy frame, red and white colors, easily fits in a backpack and quickly opens up makes for a perfect product. I like it also easy to use. It’s also red and white colored

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Liked the hard shell of the first aid kit and colors good. Size is also good to find but not too big.It came with good amount in it. I bought another since thought good to have in vehicle too and good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Great First Aid Kit! Not too small or big to carry around. It has everything you need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Only buy it for the stuff that doesn't expire
reviews.reviewText: This first aid kit is fairly complete, but the alcohol pads were completely dried out. As there's no antibiotic ointment either, you'll want to resupply all the perishable bits when you first get it. There's also no splint, which I've added to my camping first aid kit. (Knock on wood: so far I've never needed anything but bandaids and antibiotic ointment) The instant ice pack is a good addition, although I didn't try it to see if it actually cooled.The dynamo flashlight is a nice bonus and worked when we used it at home. It's cheaply made, but it'd be a backup to a cell phone flashlight and no worry about the batteries being dead.I have no training outside of first aid, so I can't evaluate this kit's use as a trauma kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfectly packaged, good suze for the money. The bright red case makes it easy to locate in event of emergency. I purchased this for my car .
